extension.summary: The direct access to TV schedules
extension.description: [B][COLOR yellow]EPG-Direct[/COLOR][/B] gives you access to almost every TV schedule in the world as it directly accesses the schedule information provided by SchedulesDirect via its JSON-API.[CR][CR]All you need to make full use of the guide is an account and active subscription at http://schedulesdirect.org
extension.disclaimer: [COLOR red][B]Note that a subscription to SchedulesDirect is required![/B][/COLOR][CR]Based on TV Guide by twinther and FTV Guide by rayw & bluezed
